title: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape
description: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape 3D is a casual game where you will become a real thief. Get into the banks, museums, and other rich places. Steal everything you see and then get away from the security guard and CCTV. Upgrade your character to increase skills and unlock new skins to make your hero unique. Open new locations to steal as much money as you can and be the most skillful thief in this game!
